alert.note: Alert for Darlington; Florence; Marion; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:02PM EDT until August 07 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT FOR FLORENCE...SOUTH CENTRAL DARLINGTON...NORTHWESTERN MARION AND WILLIAMSBURG COUNTIES... At 802 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Florence, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Florence, Lake City, Kingstree, Andrews, Timmonsville, Johnsonville, Pamplico, Quinby, Hemingway, Blue Brick, Mars Bluff, Cades, Poston, Cartersville, Nesmith, Indiantown, Gresham, Earle, Hebron, and Morrisville. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
